    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">La vida quotidiana a l'Egipte antic</string>
            <string language="en">Everyday life in ancient Egypt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tägliche Lebensdauer in altem Ägypten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Vie quotidienne en Egypte antique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Vida diária em Egipto antigo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Vita di tutti i giorni nell'Egitto antico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καθημερινή ζωή στην αρχαία Αίγυπτο</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Miniunitat didàctica (MUD) interactiva amb cinc apartats independents que ens permet apropar-nos a diferents aspectes de la vida quotidiana de l'Antic Egipte (on vivien, què menjaven, com vestien, la família, la medicina). Conté un exercici d'autoavaluació</string>
            <string language="en">Interactive mini teaching unit (MUD) in five independent sections on everyday life in ancient Egypt: where they lived, what they ate, how they dressed, the family, and medicine. The unit includes a self-assessment exercise.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">accessoris</string>
            <string language="en">accessories</string>
            <string language="es">accesorios</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">història antiga</string>
            <string language="en">ancient history</string>
            <string language="es">historia antigua</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">arquitectura</string>
            <string language="en">architecture</string>
            <string language="es">arquitectura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">construcció</string>
            <string language="en">building</string>
            <string language="es">edificio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">vestits</string>
            <string language="en">clothing</string>
            <string language="es">vestidos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">vida quotidiana</string>
            <string language="en">everyday life</string>
            <string language="es">vida cotidiana</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">aliment</string>
            <string language="en">food</string>
            <string language="es">alimento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">història</string>
            <string language="en">history</string>
            <string language="es">historia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">medicina</string>
            <string language="en">medicine</string>
            <string language="es">medicina</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">situació de la dona</string>
            <string language="en">women's position</string>
            <string language="es">condición de la mujer</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktive unterrichtende Minimaßeinheit 
(SCHLAMM) in fünf unabhängigen Kapiteln auf täglicher Lebensdauer 
in altem Ägypten: wo sie lebten, was sie, wie sie ankleideten, 
die Familie und Medizin aßen. Die Maßeinheit schließt eine 
Selbstbewertung Übung ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mini unité d'enseignement interactive (BOUE) 
dans cinq sections indépendantes la vie quotidienne en Egypte antique
: là où ils ont habité, ce qu'ils ont mangé, comment ils se 
sont habillés, la famille, et médecine. L'unité inclut un 
exercice de art de l'auto-portrait-assessment.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Unidade ensinando mini interativa (LAMA) em cinco
seções independentes na vida diária em Egipto antigo: onde 
viveram, o que comeram, como se vestiram, a família, e medicina. 
A unidade inclui um exercício do self-assessment.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mini unità d'istruzione interattiva (FANGO) in 
cinque sezioni indipendenti su vita di tutti i giorni nell'Egitto 
antico: dove hanno vissuto, che cosa hanno mangiato, come si 
sono vestiti, la famiglia e la medicina. L'unità include 
un'esercitazione di valutazione di se stesso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογική μίνι μονάδα διδασκαλίας (ΛΑΣΠΗ) σε πέντε 
ανεξάρτητα τμήματα καθημερινής ζωής στην αρχαία Αίγυπτο: 
όπου έζησαν, τι έφαγαν, πώς έντυσαν, η οικογένεια, και 
ιατρική. Η μονάδα περιλαμβάνει μια άσκηση αυτοαξιολόγησης.</string>
          </description>
